metadata.title: CVE-2021-28041 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ssh-agent in OpenSSH before 8.5 has a double free that may be relevant in afew less-common scenarios, such as unconstrained agent-socket access on alegacy operating system, or the forwarding of an agent to anattacker-controlled host.

criterions.comment: openssh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
